name: Pacport
description:
Pacport is a couch multiplayer game. It was made by me and Vrondir.

To win, collect 500 points by controlling your character. Up to six players can play using one of the following keys:

  1. Arrow keys
  2. WASD
  3. IJKL
  4. Numpad keys
  5. TFGH
  6. [;'\ potentially using ] or Enter instead of \

You can also eat other players. Note that you are faster when not collecting points, and that you cannot turn back.

Made over 3 hours for Trijam 35. Did the following optional challenges:

  • Used Godot Engine;
  • Used vector art;
  • Used our native tongue for the texts.
